'''Juan O Savin''' (real name Wayne Willott<ref>https://www.adl.org/glossary/juan-o-savin</ref>) is a self-proclaimed "patriot" and conspiracy theorist who has gained a following among supporters of the [[QAnon]] movement. Many QAnon adherents, including [[Kerry Cassidy]], belive that he is in fact [[John F. Kennedy Jr.]], who died in 1999 in a plane crash. As such, his name sometimes comes up in connection with [[Project Camelot]].
